meanings.sent1: The unsliced bread was perfect for making a sandwich.
meanings.sent2: I prefer unsliced loaves of bread for toasting.
meanings.sent3: The unsliced cake looked like a giant muffin!
meanings.sent4: Her unsliced hair flowed down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The unsliced pizza was a challenge to share among friends.

meanings.definition: Not divided or separated into parts
meanings.sent1: The unsliced pizza was a whole circle of deliciousness.
meanings.sent2: I like my sandwiches with unsliced cheese for extra creaminess.
meanings.sent3: The unsliced watermelon was a refreshing treat on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: Her unsliced attention to detail impressed her boss.
meanings.sent5: The unsliced rope was perfect for climbing up the tree.
